text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Bayraklı | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_shield = | pushpin_map = Turkey |coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Turkey | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = İzmir | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | leader_party = CHP | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Hasan Karabağ | leader_title1 = Kaymakam | leader_name1 = Kaan Peker | elevation_m = 86 | area_footnotes = | area_blank1_title = | area_blank1_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_urban = | population_as_of = | population_blank1_title = District | population_blank1 = | population_density_blank1_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | website = }} Bayraklı is a district of Izmir Province of Turkey. It is one of the metropolitan districts of Izmir. Bayraklı was turned into a district by a decree of the Government of Turkey on 6 March 2008. Before the date it was part of Karşıyaka. Category:2008 establishments in Asia Category:Districts of Turkey Category:İzmir
title: Bayraklı
